metadata.title: CVE-2022-42823 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in tvOS 16.1, macOS Ventura 13, watchOS 9.1, Safari 16.1,iOS 16.1 and iPadOS 16. Processing maliciously crafted web content may leadto arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
